meta.job_title: Interim Associate Chief Nuclear Medicine Technologist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direction to Nuclear Med Techs in the safe and effective use of radionuclides for diagnostic and therapeutic purposes.
Participate in medical, technical, and research activities to continuously enhance the quality of patient care.
Execute hands-on work with patients undergoing procedures.
Handle, prepare, and administer adjunctive medications while executing patient imaging and therapeutic procedures under MD supervision.
Conduct laboratory testing to support patient imaging and therapeutic procedures.
Promote and support patient quality and safety.

education_certification.credential: NMT-RHN Certification via ARRT or NMTCB
